data.title: Masashi Hamauzu
data.meta_description: Masashi Hamauzu is a japanese composer, best known for his work on the Final Fantasy franchise. Front Mission: Gun Hazard (1996) - Music Tobal No.1 (1996) - Music Chocobo no Fushigi na Dungeon (1997) - Music SaGa Frontier 2 (1999) - Music Final Fantasy X (2001) - Music Unlimited Saga (2002) ...
data.text:
Masashi Hamauzu is a japanese composer, best known for his work on the Final Fantasy franchise.

Game Production History[]

Front Mission: Gun Hazard (1996) - Music

Tobal No.1 (1996) - Music

Chocobo no Fushigi na Dungeon (1997) - Music

SaGa Frontier 2 (1999) - Music

Final Fantasy X (2001) - Music

Unlimited Saga (2002) - Music

Musashi: Samurai Legend (2005) - Music

Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII (2006) - Music

Oolong Tea Story (2008) - Music

Sigma Harmonics (2008) - Music

Final Fantasy XIII (2009) - Music

Music GunGun! 2 (2011) - Music

Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection (2011) - Music Arrangement

Half-Minute Hero: The Second Coming (2011) - Music

Final Fantasy XIII-2 (2011) - Music

Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy XIII (2013) - Music

Final Fantasy X/X-2 HD Remaster (2013) - Music Arrangement

Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS and Wii U (2014) - Music Arrangement

Groove Coaster (2014) - Music

The Legend of Legacy (2015) - Music

Chunithm: Seelisch Tact (2015) - Music

World of Final Fantasy (2016) - Music

The Alliance Alive (2017) - Music

Final Fantasy VII Remake (2017) - Music
